sentences.english: Even in the case of question about obscenity.
sentences.chinese: 即使是在淫秽这个问题上。

sentences.english: All the people in the party were disgusted with his bawdy jokes.
sentences.chinese: 所有参加宴会的人都有厌恶他那淫秽的笑话。

sentences.english: All the people in the party were disgusted with his bawdy jokes.
sentences.chinese: 所有参加宴会的人都厌恶他那淫秽的笑话。

sentences.english: I have taken the raunchy pictures out. Rated PG-13 for content.
sentences.chinese: 我已经去掉所有的淫秽相片。

sentences.english: The obscene part of the film should be censored.
sentences.chinese: 影片中的淫秽部分应予删除。

sentences.english: It is illegal to distribute pornography in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，传播淫秽内容有违国家法律。

sentences.english: They have cut the obscene passages from the film to show it on television.
sentences.chinese: 他们已把影片中的淫秽镜头剪去以便在电视上播映。

sentences.english: Net alarm the appeal strengthens server management Bawdy website why can open?
sentences.chinese: 网警呼吁加强服务器治理淫秽网站何以能够开办？

sentences.english: And most would hate to see a raunchy downer on a first date.
sentences.chinese: 同时，大多数人都不喜欢在初次约会时去看淫秽片。

sentences.english: Her scabrous novels shocked the public.
sentences.chinese: 她的小说淫秽不堪，公众十分震惊。

sentences.english: Young students shouldn't read those books with content and illustrations catering to prurient interests.
sentences.chinese: 青年学生不应该看那些内容和插图迎合淫秽情趣的书。

sentences.english: He had scoffed; he had wantonly associated with the reckless and the lewd.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经嘲笑过宗教，结交过放荡淫秽的人。

sentences.english: But the government soon launched a campaign against obscene publications.
sentences.chinese: 但政府很快发动了一场反淫秽出版物的战役。

sentences.english: I don't think a comedy has to have so much smut to be funny.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为喜剧就必须这么淫秽，才算好笑。

sentences.english: This law not will " download bawdy information " label prohibit sexual regulation.
sentences.chinese: 该法并未将“下载淫秽信息”列为禁止性规定。

definition: morally loose, lewd and low, lascivious and mean/wanton
to promote sex and violence/to stir up lust and covetousness
